mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_supply_template (owner_user_id, template_name, template_json, is_deleted, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{ownerUserId}, #{templateName}, #{templateJson}, #{isDeleted}, NOW(3), NOW(3))
mapper.select: SELECT id, owner_user_id, template_name, template_json, is_deleted, create_time, update_time FROM bus_supply_template WHERE owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId} AND is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC
SELECT id, owner_user_id, template_name, template_json, is_deleted, create_time, update_time FROM bus_supply_template WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_supply_template SET is_deleted = 1, update_time = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id} AND owner_user_id = #{ownerUserId} AND is_deleted = 0
